en.title: New desktop version available
en.description: Upgrade now to access a redesigned title bar to seamlessly work in Channels, Playbooks, and Boards across multiple servers with minimal context switching.

en.title: Welcome to your new sidebar
en.description: Your sidebar just got better. New updates include custom collapsible categories, drag-and-drop organization, unread channel filtering and more.

en.title: Mattermost 6.4 is here!
en.description: Mattermost v6.4 includes migration tools for Mattermost Cloud, unlimited playbooks in Starter edition, and multiple Boards enhancements including standard templates, template previews, new archive format with image support, card badges, and GIF support. [Upgrading](https://docs.mattermost.com/upgrade/upgrading-mattermost-server.html) only takes a few minutes.

en.title: Introducing custom statuses
en.description: Setting a custom status lets you express your status in any way you prefer by adding a descriptive status message and emoji thatâ€™s visible to everyone throughout the app.

en.title: Collapsed Reply Threads are here, get early access to the beta
en.description:
You can now enable an early beta of Collapsed Reply Threads in **Account Settings** > **Display** > **Collapsed Reply Threads (Beta)**

Please [review the list of known issues](https://docs.mattermost.com/messaging/organizing-conversations.html#known-issues) as we work towards stabilizing the feature.

en.title: Collapsed Reply Threads are here, get early access to the beta
en.description:
You can now enable an early beta of Collapsed Reply Threads for this workspace in **System Console** > **Experimental** > **Collapsed Reply Threads (Beta)**

Please [review the list of known issues](https://docs.mattermost.com/messaging/organizing-conversations.html#known-issues) as we work towards stabilizing the feature.

en.title: New tools, new interface
en.description: Mattermost is expanding our open source collaboration platform to include new integrated tools that address a wider variety of workflow types. Playbooks are for well-defined processes that typically follow a checklist-based structure. Boards are for managing and organizing projects and tasks across the entire product lifecycle.

en.title: Manage your projects and tasks in one place
en.description: View your active projects and work items, update weekly status and more by selecting Boards from the top-left menu.
